Notes on Statistical Inference by Casella & Berger Jake Lawler 2022-03-07 Preface These are my notes on the second edition of George Casella and Roger Bergers Statistical Inference. They are incomplete, Im still working my way through the book. Im broadly following this handbook by Oliver Y.
